subject: Football
lead_paragraph: John Mara and Steve Tisch are an unlikely pairing of old-school football and movie-style glamour, leaders of the only N.F.L. franchise evenly divided between two families.
snippet: John Mara and Steve Tisch are an unlikely pairing of old-school football and movie-style glamour, leaders of the only N.F.L. franchise evenly divided between two families.
